    • Constructor Detail

      • RegionMap

        RegionMap(int level,
         Rectangle bounds)
        Class Constructor used to create a new region split in 4
        Parameters:
        level - Corresponds to the current depth of the tree
        bounds - Rectangle object that defines a region for the tree

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears all nodes in the tree.

      • split

        private void split()
        Splits a region into 4 sub regions. If a region holds more than MAX_OBJECTS and is not at the maximum depth, then a new region is created.

      • getIndex

        private int getIndex(Rectangle rectangle)
        Determines where the object lives. -1 means that the object belongs to its parent node and not the child.
        Parameters:
        rectangle - This is the object to locate in the RegionMap
        Returns:

      • insert

        public void insert(Brick brick)
        This function inserts a new object into the map.
        Parameters:
        brick - This is the object to be inserted into the map

      • delete

        public void delete(Brick brick)
        This function removes an object from the map
        Parameters:
        brick -

      • retrieve

        public java.util.List retrieve(java.util.List returnObjects,
                      Rectangle rectangle)
        Returns a given list of objects that are in the given brick's region
        Parameters:
        returnObjects - This is the list of objects that are in the same space as the given object
        rectangle - This is the object to check which objects are in its region
        Returns:
        returnObjects This is the list of objects that are in the same space as the given object
